faq.Question: By which month will the first company arrive?
faq.Answer: Internship - Last week of July Placements- Decemeber (the process will start from October)

faq.Question: Is it true that the PPTs/first rounds of all companies will be held collectively during sept-oct and interviews will be held collectively during dec?
Please explain the new placement procedure that we are to start from this year briefly.
faq.Answer: There is nothing new, go through the policies thoroughly, attend the induction T&P session of your department.For major concern ask your Managers & for minor concerns you can connect with TPC team (coordinators).

faq.Question: If we have an on campus offer, can we not approach for any off campus opportunities?
faq.Answer: No U can't - Penalty will be imposed in case you leave an on campus offer and go for an off campus opportunity, which will be carried forward to next placement Drive
